Many years ago, evil in the form of a merciless beast materialized in the city of Paddra. It was no ordinary creature, but one that devoured time instead of prey. dialogue: (narrating) I felt a whirlwind of emotions. A large part of it was happiness. And relief was there, too. But somewhere inside, I still felt uneasy. Vanille and Fang were gone. (narrating) And from the depths of the rift appeared a darkness that had no place in our world-- an irresistible force that dragged me away to the edge of time. The screams of the dying had unlocked a gate-- A door that led directly to the throne of the goddess. Etro waited beyond the gate, and sent her miracles to the human world. But a creeping darkness slipped through, and threatened to devour our reality. Etro closed the gate, and warped the timeline. Time's flow was altered, and existence itself was distorted. I was lost. The darkness caught me in its embrace, and wrote me out of history. (In the flashback, Lightning finds herself on the shore of Valhalla.) Where am I? (narrating) Valhalla. Beyond time. Beyond life and death. A netherworld of shifting gloom. The chaotic realm of the goddess Etro. What power had brought me to this alien shore? From Valhalla's heart, I could track the entire span of time. I gazed upon the future of mankind, and sensed Etro's divine will. (In the flashback, she is transformed into her new, feathery costume.) The goddess was fading away. If her spirit should cease to be, the world would descend into entropy. I made my choice. I will fight. (flashback of the fight with Caius) This man, Caius Ballad. He seeks to destroy all hope, and bring an end to the future. Though the battle might be endless, I will never give up. Etro has chosen us--her champions. And we cannot fail.

dialogue: A cruel fate. Endlessly repeated, with no hope of release. I cannot see any future.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You're wrong, Yeul! I believe in hope!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: But what if hope does not exist?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I can't turn back now, not anymore. In my world, you no longer exist. A world without you is no world at all.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I do not have the power to stop you. The choice must be yours and yours alone. Even if the future you choose is doomed. (A new platform appears and Serah nods.)
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Kupo.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The party moves forward, and...
label: ACTION

dialogue: (auto-talk) Are they starting the launch already!?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Well, we better get moving! Hope's Cocoon is just ahead!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The party moves down onto a platform, and they race forward toward headquarters. Caius watches from above.
label: ACTION

dialogue: Yeul, are you watching? I shall fulfill my promise. Your suffering will end. (He raises his sword and the jewel within it shines. He leaps down and as he does, Bahamut appears.)
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Kupo!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Bahamut takes up a position in the sky.
label: ACTION

dialogue: It's him. (Monsters appear before the party.)
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: (over an intercom) Serah, get down! (Blasts of energy from a skyfleet strike the monsters. Hope is shown on the deck of one of the ships with a team of soldiers. He waves an arm.) Go! (The soldiers leap down.)
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hope is here!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Kupo, kupo! (Hope follows the group.)
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Good, you're okay.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: 'Course we are. Just took a little detour.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Get on board. He's the best pilot we have. (Serah and Noel nod and head for the ship.) Quickly.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: We're on!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hang on up there, you kids! You're on the Sazh express to the sky!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Take her up, Dad! (The chocobo chick rises from Sazh's afro and kwehs.)
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hope watches the ship take off. The scene ends and a new one begins.
label: ACTION

dialogue: Sazh? Is that you?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, Serah! Dajh says he misses your classes!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: A friend of yours? (Serah nods.)
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: We can catch up later. First, we've got a planet to save!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The airship catches up to Bahamut.
label: ACTION

dialogue: This is it. A fight for the future.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ready.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Kupo!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The party draws their weapons.
label: ACTION

dialogue: Let's go, Caius. You want to see how well you've trained me? Now's your chance!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Boss battle with Chaos Bahamut. Following the battle, Bahamut slams into the ship.
label: ACTION

dialogue: Noel! (She grabs on to him to keep him from falling. Bahamut strikes again, and then Caius lands on the ship.)
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You still don't know the truth, Serah. You are the same as Yeul. You can see the timeline. Even if you save your future, you will not survive to see it.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I know the truth, Caius. I know that every time I change things, I lose a part of my life. But don't you see? I don't care. (She and Noel get up.) I'm here to protect the future. And I will.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: How very noble of you. But you shall die first!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Boss battle with Caius Ballad. Once his HP is worn down...
label: ACTION

dialogue: Face your worst fear.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Following the battle, Caius runs forward and slashes at Serah. She falls to the ground. He raises his sword to strike again, but Noel blocks.
label: ACTION

dialogue: Caius! (They exchange a few blows.)
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You fight bravely to protect your friends. Like a true Guardian.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What about you, Caius!? You swore the same oath to protect Yeul!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Everything I do is for Yeul. Her spirit is bound by a curse. I will save her.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What curse!?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: How many Yeuls have you met on this journey? The jewel of the Farseers is reincarnated without end, in every age. Think what that means! Her only purpose is to die over and over! Even though she can see the future, she's not allowed to escape her fate. She is born knowing that she will die before she has truly lived. Countless deaths, without a life to give them meaning. I will break the cycle of despair. No matter how great the sacrifice. I shall destroy time and fate itself. Then Yeul's spirit... ... shall be free! (He blasts Noel to the ground.)
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Noel!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Noel! Serah! Hang on! (He performs a tricky move and Caius is blasted back.)
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Look at the sky! It's tearing apart!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Wings of night! (He summons Bahamut again.)
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: All units, move up!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: (from the bridge of another ship) We can catch him!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: No, Hope, not you!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: But, what about--
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You have to protect Vanille and Fang!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: (nods) Kupo.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You're right. I'll see you on the new Cocoon--don't be late!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Okay!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Count on it! This isn't good-bye!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Yeah, we'll be there--and Lightning will be with us!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: (nods) Take care!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Okay kids, let's do this!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Are you ready?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Yeah. (The party leaps into the vortex.)
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Don't worry, Dajh. They'll be back!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Yeah.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: And... here we go.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The party arrives at Valhalla.
label: ACTION

dialogue: Kuuuupo!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It's Valhalla!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Odin appears out of a vortex and the party mounts him.
label: ACTION

dialogue: This is Odin. Is Lightning trying to help us?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I think she sent us a present.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Kupo, kupo, kupo!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: She's watching you try to save the future, and lending you a hand.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Not just me. She's helping you, too, Noel.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Caius blasts energy at the party and they fall. They hit the ground.
label: ACTION

dialogue: Here in Valhalla, the chaos is my ally. Now let us decide the true history!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Boss battle with Caius Ballad. After his HP is fully depleted, he restores it.
label: ACTION

dialogue: You both shall know despair.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Following the battle...
label: ACTION

dialogue: Give it up, Caius!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You cannot kill me. Not now.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ready?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Together now! (They move forward and slash at him, but he slides back.) Do you think this will make Yeul happy?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Which Yeul are you talking about? I've known and protected hundreds of Yeuls. Although they had the same soul, every one of them was unique. A Yeul who dreamed of travel! A Yeul who loved to sing! A Yeul who collected flowers. They all died. All of them, before my eyes!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: But despite that, she chose to live again... So she could be with you! (He kicks Caius away.) I only ever knew the one Yeul. But that was enough.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: (flashback) You don't have to cry. We will meet again.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: She was smiling when she died. She believed in the future. She knew we'd meet again. (pointing his larger sword at Caius) Think, Caius. Think. Was it really a curse? Was it forced on her by Etro? Do you really think that Yeul wanted to die, and not come back? Of course not. Yeul wanted to come back. Every time she died in your arms, she wanted to come back. (Serah gets up.) She knew her next life would be short. She knew! Because she wanted to see you! Again and again, without end!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: (rising) Enough, no more! Lies! (He slashes and Noel blocks.)
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Why won't you believe me!? (He forces Caius back and slashes at him, knocking him to the ground. He fades into dark energy.)
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Noel?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The energy swirls around the party, then shoots up into the sky, consuming the area.
label: ACTION

dialogue: Now what?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: A giant magenta Bahamut appears in the sky and lets loose a blast of fire.
label: ACTION

dialogue: Serah!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Noel!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The two are falling through an abyss. Feathers swirl around them. Lightning appears and raises them up.
label: ACTION

dialogue: It's up to you to keep hope alive.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Lightning?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The party rises onto a battle platform as three Bahamuts appear in the sky. Boss battle with Garnet Bahamut, Amber Bahamut and Jet Bahamut. Following the battle the Bahamuts dematerialize and Serah and Noel nod at each other. A bright light shines down on them and they appear on the shore of Valhalla, along with a panting Caius. Noel steps up to him and points his larger sword at him. Caius clutches at the glowing Heart of Chaos.
label: ACTION

dialogue: Noel, you told me that Yeul is reborn because of me. Then I have to die. We must free Yeul. Kill me. You're the only one that can end this eternal torment.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Even if it were for Yeul's sake... (withdraws his sword) ... I wouldn't want to kill you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Lightning is dead. I killed her with my own hands. Will you allow me to go unpunished?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: He's lying.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: (chuckles) In Valhalla, time does not flow as it should. Long before we began our battle here, I had already faced her. Now she sleeps, never to wake. Things that shall happen in your future have already been decided... in my own past. I know how it begins, and how it ends.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Then you should know you can't provoke me... ... no matter how hard you try. I'm not going to kill you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: That's right. You hate to kill anyone, don't you? Noel, born at the end of days. You understand the true value of life. But know this. You will kill me, Noel. (He slashes at Serah, and Noel blocks.)
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Caius, no!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Cinematic Action
label: ACTION

dialogue: The moment I cease to exist, Yeul shall be released from her fate.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Noel screams at Caius and points his shorter sword at him.
label: ACTION

dialogue: Give it up. I won't do it.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Impressive. (He grabs the sword.) He who can change time, must choose between those who die, and those who live. You must bear the burden. Of the eternal paradox!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: He rams the sword into the Heart of Chaos.
label: ACTION

dialogue: Caius! (Caius falls to the ground. A blast of bright energy radiates outward, then shoots up into the sky.)
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Noel... He always wanted to come back here, didn't he? He wanted to come back here to die.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Kupo.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: He thought if he did, he could end Yeul's cycle of rebirth. This way, all the Yeuls that are called back to Valhalla... They can be with him here. They don't have to return to be born again.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: He heard you. In the end, he believed what you told him.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: This is a world that gives birth to infinite possibilities. But that's all they are, possibilities. There's no death here, but no real life, either. The Yeuls that returned to this place chose a different fate. They wanted to be born again. They didn't need immortality.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: They wanted reality.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Kupo.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: But Caius wanted something different, something he thought was better than life. A dream, where he could protect the spirits of all the Yeuls forever. But I'm not like him. I'm going to find her. Find my Yeul. It doesn't have to be forever. I just... (flash of the two embracing) I want to be with her in the future. (He takes Caius's sword.)
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Then let's do it. Build a new future.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Kupo.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: (nods) Yeah. I never wanted to hurt anyone. I didn't want to lose my Yeul. I didn't want to lose any of them. No one deserves to die. Not even you, friend. Farewell. (He stabs the sword in front of Caius's body and both vanish. Time Gates appear in the sky... )
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You've resolved the final paradox, kupo.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Then the timeline is back to how it was.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Kupo.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Serah, are you feeling okay? When the timeline changed, did you see anything?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Kupo, kupo.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I mean, did you feel any pain?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Kupo!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: No, I feel great.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Kupo.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Good. Why don't we go and find Lightning?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Okay.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I don't think she's here, kupo.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh no, wait. You don't think that Caius really... ?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: No, that was just a lie. Now that the timeline is fixed, she's back in her own world. I bet she's waiting for you, along with everyone else.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Kupo! (Gates start disappearing.)
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The paradoxes are resolved. The gates will disappear soon. We better hurry on back.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Right! So this will takes (captioned - she actually says "take") us to 500 AF. I guess that's where we'll be living now, 500 years in my future. Maybe Lightning will be there.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Kupo.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It was the future Lightning fought to protect. It's the start of a brand-new era.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What about Fang and Vanille?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: They'll be there for sure. And don't forget, Hope is in that time as well. Once the gates disappear, everyone stays where they are. Every day we'll be able to look into the sky and see the new Cocoon above us.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I bet Snow will be waiting there, kupo!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Snow. Well, we'll see. That'll be up to Lightning, I think.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Kupo.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Yeah. Let's go!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Kupo!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: They step through the gate and a cutscene begins back in Academia.
label: ACTION

dialogue: Metashield has been deployed.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Major fissures have been detected in the pillar. Collapse is imminent.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Rescue team, report!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hold on. Switching displays.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: We're pullin' out!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Come on, Sazh.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: We've got Vanille and Fang. Their crystal is intact! Bringin' them home!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Thank you, Sazh. Thank you for saving them. They've kept our world safe for centuries. But now they can rest, and join us in our new ark.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Paradox levels are holding! Sir, they're not coming down!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The gates haven't been shut down yet. Which means, the timeline must still be unstable.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Director?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It's okay. Serah and Noel will fix it. They just need more time.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The pillar is coming down!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The ending sequence begins.
label: ACTION

dialogue: Charice - "New World"
label: ACTION

dialogue: Cocoon collapses and the new ark is activated and raised.
label: ACTION

dialogue: (narrating) This is our ark--our haven. It will be called 'Bhunivelze'... ... and it shall be the new home for the human race.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Serah and Noel flow through the timestream and arrive on Gran Pulse...
label: ACTION

dialogue: Kupo!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey! Look! The heroes are back!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It's Sazh.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: They land.
label: ACTION

dialogue: Nice catch!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: (chuckles) Welcome home!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Thanks. (extends his hand for Serah) Gotcha.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Kupopo. Kupo.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You're okay now.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Kupo!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Are you feeling all right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: She nods and chuckles.
label: ACTION

dialogue: It'll be good to see everyone again.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Kupo.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Yeah.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: She turns as the gate fades away.
label: ACTION

dialogue: Kupo.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The gates are closed.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It's the end of our journey. Hey, Noel.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hm?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Thank you... (She closes her eyes and moans in pain.)
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Serah? Not now, please! (The image of the gate appears in her eyes. Noel grabs her shoulders.) Serah! Snap out of it! No! (She faints.) Serah! Serahhhh!!!!!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hope's ship arrives and Hope leaps to the deck.
label: ACTION

dialogue: Kupo.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Noel? But why... ? You were safe, everything was fine.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The future changed. It changed. If you change the future, you change the past. The effects ripple outwards, up and down the timeline. The seeress is forced to see it all.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You mean Serah... she saw this vision?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Yes. And it killed her. Serah. She knew the risk. If we altered the future, she knew what would happen; that her life could be in danger. But she still chose to save it. I wanted to protect her... I thought I had. I thought she was safe. (The song ends.)
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The sky goes dark.
label: ACTION

dialogue: Kupo? Kupo? Kupo! (He collapses.) The goddess... She has gone, kupo.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The Heart of Chaos beats in my chest, a manifestation of Etro. Should this heart stop beating, the goddess will die once again.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: (staring at his hands) I killed the goddess?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: A distant bell tolls as darkness overwhelms the world.
label: ACTION

dialogue: When the goddess dies, the chaos of Valhalla is unleashed. The chaos has the power to warp the timeline and destroy the past.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Bands of energy overwhelm the world. In Valhalla, Lightning is shown sitting in crystal on the throne.
label: ACTION

dialogue: To Be Continued...

dialogue: Valhalla -Year Unknown-
label: ACTION

dialogue: Time flows in circles. Until all possibilities have been tested, it will remain locked in this arc for all eternity. Here, a moment in history endlessly repeats itself. Perhaps the same tale has been acted out in the same place at the same time for eons beyond counting, but such knowledge will never be the province of mankind. Only the goddess atop her throne in the timeless realm of Valhalla can see the span of history in its entirety. But now her temple lies dormant, and the bells ring a funeral dirge. The battle to decide the fate of the world begins once again...

He waited for one who possessed the strength to defeat him. After many centuries, his patience was rewarded with the arrival of Noel, the last Guardian to be born. Caius pinned all his hopes on this child. The immortal did not want Noel to simply succeed him--he wanted Noel to surpass him.
label: ACTION

label: ACTION

dialogue: (narrating) The moment I defeated Caius... ... the power of chaos coursed through my body, and transformed me into a Guardian.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Paradox Ending: Heir to Chaos
label: ACTION

dialogue: (narrating) That's when I saw memories of his past, his life. I saw the day he slayed his predecessor, and became a l'Cie to protect the seeress. I saw the great war, and how it tore Gran Pulse apart. I saw the battle in which he saved the seeress from her enemies, and was crowned a hero. All he ever wanted was for Yeul to be happy. The goddess Etro was struck by his undying devotion, and offered Caius her own heart. With this, he became an immortal being, one who could protect Yeul till the end of time. That marked the beginning. The beginning of his eternal nightmare. I have Caius's memories inside me. Just like Caius before me, I've received the terrible gift of eternal life. And Serah, she's now destined to live the fate of a Farseer, just like Yeul. Caius had put all his hopes in me. He believed that I was the one that could stop the beating of his cursed heart. But I couldn't. I wasn't strong enough. The heart took over my body and threw me into an endless spiral--a prison without end. But then... I saw a light. I don't know where it leads. I don't know what kind of world is out there, waiting for me. But I do know one thing--I have to take Caius's place. I'm his successor. I can't escape this fate. This is just the beginning of my never-ending nightmare. I have to face whatever's out there, in that unknown world. I have to save Yeul. I have to save Serah. The gift of immortality made me realize that hope is a double-edged blade. It's cruel to those who cling to impossible dreams. For the undying, this torment haunts them for all eternity. Caius lived knowing the futility of his single plea, his single hope. I wonder what awaits me. A life without hope? A life without friendship? A life of utter solitude?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Secret Ending: The Goddess is Dead
label: ACTION

dialogue: Her end is final. No man, woman, or god can bring her back now. Ignorant and blind to their true mission, they did exactly what I wanted. (He is shown sitting on the throne.) At the end of their journey to save the world, they stilled the goddess's power. (ends narration) Yeul, let us begin. (He leaps down from the throne.) We are freed from our eternal curse. Embrace the new world. (He stabs his sword in the ground.) The goddess is dead. (Dark energy radiates out from his sword and a red light gleams in his eye. The scene ends.)
